mapper.select: SELECT a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.modem_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.modem_type) as modem_type_nm , a.node_kind , a.model_seq , m.model_nm , a.fw_version , a.fw_build , a.hw_version , a.modem_mode , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_MODEM_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_DEVICE_INFO d ON (a.device_id = d.device_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_DEVICE_MODEL m ON (a.model_seq = m.model_seq)
SELECT count(*) as co FROM GND_MODEM_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_DEVICE_INFO d ON (a.device_id = d.device_id)

SELECT a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.modem_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.modem_type) as modem_type_nm , a.node_kind , a.model_seq , m.model_nm , a.fw_version , a.fw_build , a.hw_version , a.modem_mode , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_MODEM_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_DEVICE_INFO d ON (a.device_id = d.device_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_DEVICE_MODEL m ON (a.model_seq = m.model_seq) WHERE a.device_id = #{deviceId}
